item.title: Marketing and Communications Specialist
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: We’re looking for Marketing & Communications Specialists to join Dwarves and work remotely. The ideal candidate will have a passion for technology, a strong understanding of the software development industry, and excellent communication skills.
